mapper.insert: INSERT INTO taskReviewProcess( taskAssignmentId, role, file, reviewOpinion, reviewPassedFlag, reviewButtonShowFlag, rejectLevel, createTime, updateTime, orderNum, deltag) VALUES ( #{taskAssignmentId}, #{role}, #{file}, #{reviewOpinion}, #{reviewPassedFlag}, #{reviewButtonShowFlag}, #{rejectLevel}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{orderNum}, #{deltag})
mapper.select: select task.id, task.taskAssignmentId, task.role, case when role = 'designer' then tmp2.designer when role = 'reviewer' then tmp2.reviewer when role = 'inspector' then tmp2.inspector when role = 'validationer' then tmp2.validationer end as username, task.file, task.reviewOpinion, task.reviewPassedFlag, task.reviewButtonShowFlag, task.rejectLevel, task.createTime, task.updateTime, task.orderNum, task.deltag from taskReviewProcess task left join ( select tmp1.id, tmp1.taskName, tmp1.projectId, tmp1.finishedLevel, tmp1.designerId, tmp1.reviewerId, tmp1.inspectorId, tmp1.validationerId, u1.username as designer, u2.username as reviewer, u3.username as inspector, u4.username as validationer, p1.departmentId as departmentId, d1.departmentName as departmentName, tmp1.taskLevel, tmp1.startTime, tmp1.stopTime, tmp1.createtTime, tmp1.updateTime from taskAssignment tmp1 left join user u1 on tmp1.designerId = u1.id left join user u2 on tmp1.reviewerId = u2.id left join user u3 on tmp1.inspectorId = u3.id left join user u4 on tmp1.validationerId = u4.id left join project p1 on tmp1.projectId = p1.id left join department d1 on d1.id = p1.departmentId where (tmp1.deltag <> '1' or tmp1.deltag is null) ) tmp2 on task.taskAssignmentId = tmp2.id where task.taskAssignmentId = #{taskAssignmentId} order by task.id asc
mapper.insert: update taskReviewProcess set taskAssignmentId = #{taskAssignmentId}, role = #{role}, file = #{file}, reviewOpinion = #{reviewOpinion}, reviewPassedFlag = #{reviewPassedFlag}, reviewButtonShowFlag = #{reviewButtonShowFlag}, rejectLevel = #{rejectLevel}, createTime = #{createTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, orderNum = #{orderNum}, deltag = #{deltag} where id = #{id}
